params.forwarder: The address of the Forwarder contract that is being used.

returns._0: isTrustedForwarder `true` if the Forwarder is trusted to forward relayed transactions by this Recipient.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addTrustedForwarder(address).notice: Allows the owner to add a trusted forwarder.

isTrustedForwarder(address).notice: :warning: **Warning** :warning: The Forwarder can have a full control over your Recipient. Only trust verified Forwarder.

removeTrustedForwarder(address).notice: Allows the owner to remove a trusted forwarder.

documentation.text:
Emitted when a new trusted forwarder is added.
 @param forwarder The address of the forwarder.

Emitted when a trusted forwarder is removed.
 @param forwarder The address of the forwarder.

Allows the owner to add a trusted forwarder.
 @param _forwarder The address of the forwarder.

Allows the owner to remove a trusted forwarder.
 @param _forwarder The address of the forwarder.

@title ERC2771Recipient
 @dev Based on ERC2771Recipient from OpenGSN, but adding support for multiple forwarders
